name: 8.1 & 8.2 "The Improbable Dream" Pt.1 and 2 Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was Rebecca having dreams about?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Rebecca hadn't had a date to her house since 1986 and it was now in the 90s so she was starting to get desperate to be with a man. In her dream, she told Sam it was pity that made her go out with him. Even in her dreams she wasn't fond of Sam.

questions.text: What word did Rebecca forbid Sam to use?
questions.explanation:
bed.

	Sam had no idea at this point that Rebecca was having erotic dreams about him so he was confused by this. All he had asked her was if she woke up on the wrong side of the bed.

questions.text: Who did Woody think Rebecca was having dreams about?
questions.correct: the guy with the wavy hair who comes in all sweaty after bowling
options: some random man that none of them have ever met
questions.explanation:
the guy with the wavy hair who comes in all sweaty after bowling.

	When Sam tells them it was him he says, "You said he was young Sam". Woody being so much younger than Sam thinks of Sam as an older man.

questions.text: How many women did Sam say he slept with?
questions.explanation:
over 1000.

	Cliff has questioned Sam's methods for putting Rebecca to sleep. Sam replied, "Excuse me Cliff, have you slept with over a thousand women?" Sam might have been exaggerating of course, but apparently he didn't realize the dangers of promiscuous sex.

questions.text: Who was on the cover of the "Fortune" magazine Rebecca fell asleep with?
questions.explanation:
Robin Colcord.

	Rebecca had one goal in life...to become rich. Robin was said to be one of the richest men in the world so Rebecca read all she could about him.

Roger Rees.

	Roger Rees was born in Wales in 1944. He is best known for playing Robin on "Cheers" and Lord John Marbury on "The West Wing". Besides acting, he is also a director. He was also the Sheriff of Rottingham in "Robin Hood: Men in Tights".

questions.text: What did Robin say he wanted to buy Rebecca?
questions.explanation:
desk.

	Rebecca thought he was referring to the water he spilled when he said he wanted to buy her a new one. She said, "It's just an old water."

questions.text: What did Carla say about men?
questions.explanation:
"Men are pigs".

	Rebecca wanted to talk about her new boyfriend but Carla wasn't interested. Carla had a very bad first husband, and Eddie was never around so she didn't have much good to say about men.

questions.text: In Sam's dream, whose face did we see when Rebecca pulls off the mask?
questions.explanation:
Al.

	Al was the old guy at the bar. Carla called the dream a premonition dream. She said Rebecca was going to tell Sam something wasn't right between her and Robin.

questions.text: Who was upset that Sam said he cared about Rebecca?
questions.explanation:
Carla.

	Carla said it was bad enough she had to deal with Diane for five years. She wanted Sam to stab her with the pool cue stick.
